name: Zoo Animals Transporter Truck parking Simulator 3D
name_original: Zoo Animals Transporter Truck parking Simulator 3D
description:
Zoo Animals Transporter Truck Simulator 3D

THE JUNGLE ANIMALS ARE WANDRING IN THE BIG CITY.

Discover the real world of wild zoo animals. This real animal simulator game contains a lot of epic wild animals which are running around in the big 3D city. It is your job as the hero of this game to get all the angry animals back to their cage. Your duty is to protect the citizens from the angry animals in this zoo animal truck transport game. Drive your own extreme Animal truck to catch the Wild zoo animals like, lion, deer, hippo, fox, zebra elephant, beer & wolf. You have been chasing wild animals, load them in a transport truck. Rush them to the zoo in a fast heavy duty transportation vehicle in the whole chaos. Buckle your seat belt, hold your steering, and let your crazy wheels moving in this ultimate Animal transportation game. Drive through the streets, escape road traffic and reach your destination.

Get ready for an Ultimate wild ride of Animal truck transporter. Catch & Transport these wild animals from city area to zoo safely. Drive heavy zoo animal cargo truck. Control zoo animals with animal controller and load them on the animal transporter truck .Take up this zoo animal transport challenge and show your driving skills in this zoo animal truck transport. Forget your dreads. Your Extreme challenge to Control the king of the jungle wild cheetahs, huge, elephant, fox, bear, deer, heavy hippo and zebra. Drive & deliver these wild animals in a heavy cargo trailer and unload them in the zoo. Be careful, these wild beasts are untrained. Also avoid hitting the traffic vehicles like car, bus etc. Enjoy and feel the thrill and adventure of the risk involved. Become hero of animal world by completing truck transport missions in time and by preciesley parking the truck in given parking area.

Surely! You have not played such type of animal transport games as yet. So revive the uniqueness in animal transporter games blended with the concept of 3D trailer animal transporter. It's your time to display some courage and responsibility required to operate this heavy loaded transporter truck with wild animals. So take it now and enjoy the drive of ZOO ANIMAL TRANSPORTER simulator 3D.

Zoo Animals Transporter Truck - GAME FEATURES:

Lot of Challenging levels
Extreme animal truck driving experience
Stunning HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
Transporting African animals like Lion, Elephant, Bear, Wolf, Deer, Rhino, Hippo, Fox, Horse & Zebra
Realistic controls over the city environment
Smooth Steering
Easy and free to use
Offline Play
Free to play
Explore the beautiful open world
Realistic Zoo Environment
Realistic animations of Zoo animals
Thrill of transportation

This is the game you have been waiting for!

We hope you will like our Zoo Animal Truck Transport 3D and don’t forget to rate us on iTune Store! Thanks
